ygData.msgSnippet: My ONLY Comment, Is in regards to the stats. Uhm Why aren t any of them green? IF this character existed, and WAS wearing all these things, The Stats on the
ygData.messageBody:
My ONLY Comment, Is in regards to the stats. Uhm Why aren't any of them
green? IF this character existed, and WAS wearing all these things, The
Stats on the char SHOULD be green. No char could have a base of 254 for
every stat. Sorries.

I could see a Level bug, like the lvl 75 char. However, his stats wern't
wack.

Countt


As posted by another user here, they pointed to the website...

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/poorguy.jpg

and used the gun in the picture as a refrence, since looking at the pic and
site, you 1st notice the guy is lvl 100... umm YEA.. Gotta start looking at
that :) Open graphics program and notice that the text was changed, almost
all
the text on this page was change.. other then the message text. <Graphics
guy
here sorry folks> You'll notice that some of the items have been "PASTED"
into
there respected positions, not a bad job thou.. but the smuging is blantly
obvious even for a jpg....but the gun isn't smudged.. <go look - zoom in>

HOWEVER... that would mean that this guy would have had to goto great
lengths
to make a new graphic and model for the "gun", even thou the model info is
not
avable to public <989 propritary> HUMM... makes me wonder... even the "BALL"

Axehandler
